name: Bamboozled (Pre-Alpha)
description:
This is Bamboozled. A (sort of) fast paced tower defense. With lots of unique spins to the generic tower defense game, this is like no other!

It's a war between pandas and zombies. The zombies have planned a attack, and the pandas must defend their bamboo forest homeland.

Keep in mind that this is pre-alpha! This is not the full game, this is just the pre-alpha version. This will probably not represent the full game very much.

NOTE: For Mac(and maybe Windows) users, you have to download this wonderful game through the (not as wonderful) itch.io desktop app.

Trailer made by the wonderful iq3q https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCEGjm6cxfpo7G2EH1RNIVXQ Go check him out!

Discord server link! Join for sneak peaks on new updates, you can also give feedback and suggestions if you want! https://discord.gg/QUTctKT
